extendedInfo.description: KUSC has launched their official Android App, please check it out:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.uscradio.kuscI'm updating only on a limited basis now.--Hello Brad (February 29, 2012), thank you for your honest review!Yes, it goes in an infinite loop when the network is poor.  I did that so the music keeps going, and doesn't stop.  I guess it would be a better idea to make it an option, so the user can choose what they want.---Hello Joseph (February 20, 2012), thank you for commenting!Thank you for the clarification on the favorites feature.  I'll see what I can do.---Current features:- Listen to KUSC.  From the menu, select Play.- Real time playlist.  Updates every minute, or by pressing the Refresh button.- Retrieve special program information.- Shop Online at ArkivMusic.com.  A portion of every purchase made goes to support KUSC!- Choose audio quality.  From the menu, select Settings.This is an open source app, and source code is available upon request.

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Hi!  Once again thanks for the app!   By favorites feature I meant maybe you could \"bookmark\" or \"star\" whatever is playing on kusc at the moment so you can keep track of a list of favorite pieces you hear!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GREAT .. love kusc it would be nice if you added some pictures or classical news to the application..it seems s bit bland. Color it up.. thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Nice functionality but a poor sounding audio stream. I have a very nice stereo and the stream may as well be from a phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Love KUSC and the app works. The only complaint is having to actually go into the menu and have it play, but other than that, the app is terrific. Thank you for your contribution!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great and it\'s simple!
reviews.comment: It does exactly what I hoped it would do, and does it quite well. It\'s a small app that doesn\'t run continuous ads. It just works.
reviews.author: A Google User
